title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4501.8 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4501.8 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) Fees for
inspection, search or certification. There shall be no fee charged for: (1)
inspection of records; (2)
search for records; or
(3)
any certification pursuant to this

Part. (b) Fees for
photocopies. The fee for copies of records which do not exceed 9 x 14 inches is
25 cents per photocopy. The fee for copies of records other than photocopies
which are 9 x 14 inches or less in size shall be the actual copying cost, excluding fixed agency costs such as salaries. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4501.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
